title: Celebrity Vaccine Endorsements? Reality, Shame Won’t Stop GOP 12.15.20
itunes:title: Celebrity Vaccine Endorsements? Reality, Shame Won’t Stop GOP 12.15.20
description:
In episode 779, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Jeremiah Watkins to discuss Trump's campaign HQ taking down his name, Stephen Miller's 'alternate electors' plan, the right pushing for terrorism, The Epoch Times, what food the UK will be able to access after Brexit, what famous people can sell the vaccine to us, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Says He’ll Fight On. His Campaign HQ Is Literally Taking Down His Name.
  2. Stephen Miller: 'Alternate' electors will keep Trump election challenge alive
  3. Trump Allies Eye Long-Shot Election Reversal in Congress, Testing Pence
  4. Poll: Less than one-quarter of Republicans trust election results
  5. Radical right-wing commentator Josh Bernstein declares that he will die rather than live in slavery under a Biden regime: "The blood of patriots and tyrants could be coming, and it's going to be hopefully a lot more tyrants than patriots."
  6. 'The Epoch Times' spreads QAnon ideas. Here's how to help boycott them (if you live in the US)
  7. Trump, QAnon and an impending judgment day: Behind the Facebook-fueled rise of The Epoch Times
  8. Cheddar instead of Brie, swap avocado for eggs on toast and plan a stay-cation! What No Deal could mean for the UK's favourite foods, travel, holidays, second homes and the economy
  9. Willingness to Get COVID-19 Vaccine Ticks Up to 63% in U.S.
  10. Trump Administration Plans a Rushed Effort to Encourage Americans to Be Vaccinated
  11. COVID vaccine: celebrity endorsements work – even if people don’t like it
  12. What Elvis Presley’s televised polio vaccination can tell us about the shortfalls of celebrity-endorsed health campaigns
  13. Which celebrity should be the face of the COVID-19 vaccine?
  14. Experts warn of low Covid vaccine trust among Black Americans
  15. How the CIA’s Fake Vaccination Campaign Endangers Us All
  16. How the bin Laden Raid Put Vaccinators Under the Gun in Pakistan
  17. U.S. Cites End to C.I.A. Ruses Using Vaccines
  18. WATCH: Onoe Caponoe - Lost The Love (OFFICIAL VIDEO) (Prod. DJ Sabre Watts)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
